Wondrous item, uncommon
This oil grants you lupine features. Each pot contains enough for three applications. One application grants one of the following benefits (your choice): darkvision out to a range of 60 feet, advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell, a walking speed of 50 feet, or a new attack option (use the statistics of a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.yawTeS8u2FCfzzZH]{wolf’s} bite attack) for 5 minutes.
If you use all three applications at one time, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.04nMsTWkIFvkbXlY]{polymorph} on yourself, transforming into a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.yawTeS8u2FCfzzZH]{wolf}. While you are in the form of a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.yawTeS8u2FCfzzZH]{wolf}, you retain your Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores. In addition, you don’t need to maintain concentration on the spell, and the transformation lasts for 1 hour, until you use a bonus action to revert to your normal form, or until you drop to 0 hit points or die.
